title: 115_s166
content: Muhammad Ali Commemorative Coin Act This bill requires the Department of the Treasury to mint and issue commemorative coins that emblemize the life and legacy of Muhammad Ali. nbsp. Surcharges received from the sale of these coins shall be paid to: (1) the Muhammad Ali Center in Louisville, Kentucky. (2) the Muhammad Ali Institute for Peace and Justice at the University of Louisville. And (3) the Muhammad Ali Parkinson Center and Movement Disorder Clinic.
